title: Low Priority Queue....
body: Left a game that was about to end cause my internet was being reset, join back and I have Low Priority Queue for 5 games lasting 20 minutes each. Thanks Riot.....that'll make me wanna play your game even more

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sorry to hear about that, it really sucks when you end up in a LPQ due to issues out of your control.

Unfortunately the Leaverbuster system is automated and punishments are unable to be revoked.

The system does take into account the fact that you may have to step away from your computer sometimes/your connection may be unstable. Which is why it takes multiple instances of leaving games to trigger a punishment (Although ranked games are treated more serious).

For more information regarding the Leaverbuster system and how it functions check out the [Leaverbuster FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ).
